benchmark_details.name: VGC-Bench
benchmark_details.overview: VGC-Bench is a benchmark designed to evaluate AI generalization in Pokémon VGC, including infrastructure for multi-agent learning, a suite of competitive baselines, and robust evaluation tools for performance, generalization, exploitability, and human interaction.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the generalization capabilities of AI agents in the challenging and combinatorially complex environment of Pokémon VGC.

data.source: Human battle replays from Pokémon Showdown.

methodology.calculation: Win rates and ELO ratings calculated based on cross-evaluations among agents.
methodology.interpretation: Higher ELO ratings and win rates indicate better performance against competing agents.
methodology.validation: Extensive agent cross-evaluation against human players and other AI agents.
